title: Ranking Saquon Barkley against other top RBs, Lamar Jackson part of "Big Five"? (Football 04/19)
description:
Lance Zierlein of NFL Media joins Will Brinson to break down the NFL Draft a week away from the big showdown in Dallas. The guys debate whether it's worth it to take a guard (read: Quenton Nelson) early, what will happen in the top five of the draft, where Saquon Barkley ranks among other top running backs from previous classes, whether Lamar Jackson is a worthwhile first-round pick and if he deserves to be part of the "Big Five," what prospects might be flying under the radar as first-round candidates, what candidates might be overhyped heading into the draft and then discuss Arden Key and how much character factors into scouting.
